realEstate.heading: Choose the type of property you would like to live in
realEstate.description: You can also select if you rent or buy and check out any additional costs by using the info icon

carsForSale.heading: Choose the car you would like to drive
carsForSale.description: Use the info icon to see details on weekly repayment costs, maintenance, fuel and any other running costs associated with the type of car you would like to own

groceries.heading: Choose the brands that go into your shopping cart
groceries.description: (average for a single person per week)

grubClub.heading: Choose your preferred eating out place

holidayHub.heading: Where do you want to holiday this year?

fashion.heading: Choose your look and the types of clothes you like to buy
